game.name: Mouse Down
game.description:
This robotic mouse buddy is on his new adventure! But, this is a first time when he has planned something like that. The best part is that he has approached you for help and you have got agreed to guide him. Is it a right time to join his hands? If yes, join Mouse Down and be prepared to complete his path. Make sure you control this little mechanic mouse to collect all the keys that you see along the way.

The collection of keys will help your character to recharge his time and finds his way before it is too late. Try to avoid all the obstacles and make him run fast in this brand new adventure challenge! This robotic mouse buddy cannot take rest until he reaches the finish line. It is important to save your progress by passing the checkpoints. We will suggest you to finish the game with as few deaths as possible.

Do not take so much time as this mechanical mouse is ready to roll. Put your fingers on the mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to get him through this endless maze before he runs out of energy! Good luck to grab as many keys as you can and make him alive until you score a respected score on the leaderboards! Check out even more challenging and engaging arcade puzzles online and have a blast with your friends!

game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO MOVE THE MOUSE AND COLLECT THE KEYS
